law.catch_line: Notification to local governments and public of proposed corrective action plan -- Comment period -- Public hearing.

text.section: A comment period of at least thirty (30) days shall follow publication of the notice. During the comment period, any person may submit written comments to the cabinet concerning the corrective action plan and may request a public hearing. The cabinet may hold a public hearing if the request is made.
The cabinet may hold a public hearing in any geographical area affected by the remediation on the question of whether to approve or deny the corrective action plan.
The cabinet shall consider all written comments and public testimony prior to taking any action.

law.history: Created 2001 Ky. Acts ch. 128, sec. 8, effective June 21, 2001.
